name: TRIGGERED
detailed_description:
Locked inside a mental hospital, your mission is to "simply", escape.

This is however, NOT an easy game, you WILL get frustrated, angry and TRIGGERED.

You get 1 Life, 1 HP, Limited Time & Limited Ammo.

When you die (and you will, A LOT), it's game over, and you have to start from the beginning.

  • Several different types of enemeis, including bosses
  • Very limited ammo
  • No checkpoints, you die, you reset.
  • Limited time
  • 3 Difficulty levels
  • Multiplayer support, play with a friend
  • Game Score & Best times are tracked via Leaderboards
about_the_game:
Locked inside a mental hospital, your mission is to "simply", escape.

This is however, NOT an easy game, you WILL get frustrated, angry and TRIGGERED.

You get 1 Life, 1 HP, Limited Time & Limited Ammo.

When you die (and you will, A LOT), it's game over, and you have to start from the beginning.

  • Several different types of enemeis, including bosses

  • No checkpoints, you die, you reset.
  • Limited time

  • Multiplayer support, play with a friend
  • Game Score & Best times are tracked via Leaderboards
short_description: TRIGGERED is a speed runner game, get from point A to point B as fast as you can, without dying.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-Bit only)
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 or AMD R9 270
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-Bit only)
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD R9 290X
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
